alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains; Upper Weiser River (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 20 at 3:43PM MDT until August 21 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: .Expect Record setting rainfall today and Monday across the region associated with the remnants of Tropical Storm Hilary. This will likely produce flash flooding, rock slides and debris flows. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Idaho, including the following areas, Boise Mountains, Camas Prairie, Lower Treasure Valley ID, Owyhee Mountains, Southwest Highlands, Upper Treasure Valley, Upper Weiser River and West Central Mountains. Portions of Oregon, including the following areas, Baker County, Harney County, Malheur County and Oregon Lower Treasure Valley. * WHEN...Through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains; Upper Weiser River
